text: The Armenian National Committee of America (ANCA) is the largest and most influential Armenian American advocacy organization in the United States. Working in coordination with a network of offices, chapters, and supporters throughout the country and affiliated organizations around the world, the ANCA advances the concerns of the Armenian American community on a broad range of issues. Beyond the Central offices of ANCA are in Washington DC, Boston and Los Angeles, ANCA has more than fifty local chapters and thousands of activists, it is cooperating with a large web of regional Armenian National Committees (or Armenian Cause/Hay Tad Offices) in Armenia, Russia, France, the Middle East, Canada and Australia. The executive director of ANCA is Aram Hamparian. ==Other websites== * Armenian National Committee of America website. * ANC of Central California Official site * An interview with ANCA executive director Aram Hamparian Category:Armenian diaspora Category:Political organizations based in the United States
title: Armenian National Committee of America
